title: Unable to patch
body:
Have been unable to patch the client since upgrading to the new beta. It finishes the scan of the files, then is unable to patch. It gets maybe to 1% if I'm lucky. 

Keeps giving me the popup that says...something's on their end and preventing you from patching. Been like this all day.

replies.body: It seems like something is preventing the patcher from scanning your game files, so it can't prep for an update.  Go through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
